name: BoomBoom
description:
Having a party? How about letting EVERYONE PLAY! Use up to 4 USB controllers OR break out your smartphone, connect it to the same network as your computer then open its browser to happyfuntimes.net and you're in!

This is mostly a proof of concept / demo for happyfuntimes, a system for creating 2 to 100+ player games. A free open source library for HTML or Unity. There are way more interesting ideas for super local multiplayer games.

Please make some cool games!
